text: Koedfoltos is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. ==Species== * Koedfoltos hackeri Laszlo, G.Ronkay, L.Ronkay & Witt, 2007 * Koedfoltos parducka Laszlo, G.Ronkay, L.Ronkay & Witt, 2007 ==References== * , 2007, Esperiana Buchreihe zur Entomologie 13: 1-683 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Koedfoltos
